channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Time Tracker
item.description:
Time Tracker

A robust, self-hosted time tracking application designed for teams and freelancers who need reliable time management without cloud dependencies. Built with Flask and optimized for Raspberry Pi deployment, TimeTracker provides persistent timers, comprehensive reporting, and a modern web interface.
item.content:encoded:
Time Tracker

A robust, self-hosted time tracking application designed for teams and freelancers who need reliable time management without cloud dependencies. Built with Flask and optimized for Raspberry Pi deployment, TimeTracker provides persistent timers, comprehensive reporting, and a modern web interface.

item.title: Watch Digest
item.description:
Watch Digest

WatchDigest is a monitoring tool that scans local Docker containers, checks whether their images are outdated, and optionally updates those images. It can notify you across a wide range of messaging platforms when updates are available or have been applied.
Watchtower has not been updated for a while now. Maybe this is a good alternative then.
item.content:encoded:
Watch Digest

WatchDigest is a monitoring tool that scans local Docker containers, checks whether their images are outdated, and optionally updates those images. It can notify you across a wide range of messaging platforms when updates are available or have been applied.
Watchtower has not been updated for a while now. Maybe this is a good alternative then.

item.title: Immich Drop
item.description:
Immich Drop

A tiny, zero-login web app for collecting photos/videos from anyone into your Immich server.
This could have been a good alternative to Wedding Share.
item.content:encoded:
Immich Drop

A tiny, zero-login web app for collecting photos/videos from anyone into your Immich server.
This could have been a good alternative to Wedding Share.

item.title: Pangolin Rule Updater
item.description:
Pangolin Rule Updater

Small service which updates a bypass rule of your pangolin service.
Can’t get enough of automations.
item.content:encoded:
Pangolin Rule Updater

Small service which updates a bypass rule of your pangolin service.
Can’t get enough of automations.

item.title: ColoCrossing's Labor Day Sale - Dedicated Servers from $99/year!! VPS with 2x Bandwidth & Storage!!

16GB RAM
250GB SSD or 1TB HDD
40TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps Port

32GB RAM

item.title: Pocketbase n8n node
item.description:
Pocketbase n8n node

This is a n8n community node. It lets you use PocketBase in your n8n workflows.

PocketBase is an open source backend consisting of embedded database (SQLite) with realtime subscriptions, built-in auth management, convenient dashboard UI and simple REST-ish API.
item.content:encoded:
Pocketbase n8n node

This is a n8n community node. It lets you use PocketBase in your n8n workflows.

PocketBase is an open source backend consisting of embedded database (SQLite) with realtime subscriptions, built-in auth management, convenient dashboard UI and simple REST-ish API.

item.title: GoCron
item.description:
GoCron

A go based task scheduler with GUI.
item.content:encoded:
GoCron

A go based task scheduler with GUI.

item.title: Sousous personal finance
item.description:
Sousous personal finance

Sousous is a clean and lightweight personal finance app. It helps you track your expenses, categorize them, and get a quick view of your budget.
item.content:encoded:
Sousous personal finance

Sousous is a clean and lightweight personal finance app. It helps you track your expenses, categorize them, and get a quick view of your budget.

item.title: Newsletterr
item.description:
Newsletterr

newsletterr is an email tool for Plex Servers. Reach your users with Tautulli information and recommendations from conjurr
Sometimes it’s too boring to stick to just Tautulli’s Recently Added Newsletter.
item.content:encoded:
